title: Is child poverty still a major issue when compared to child poverty in the year 1920, for example? - Quora

response.answer_text: It's a major issue. Any sick malnourished child is still suffering, in any decade or year. Two million kids starved to death globally last year. Many die before five years of age. Stunting affects millions of others. There are simply more now than in 1920.
Child poverty is only an issue because Democrats and Socialists are working hard to keep it alive.
